column5: If you want to convert your degree from any discipline into something more suitable for working in a more business oriented role, management position or enterprise, International Business and Finance is certainly a discipline area to consider as it has the potential to allow you to work anywhere in the world. You learn business, management and finance by practical application of theory, three different disciplines but extremely well aligned to help you gain the advantage in employment options and career direction.. This programme has an international emphasis which is now expected in many businesses whether you stay in your own country or work overseas. You learn with support from a range of top class facilities including the UK's first University Trading Room.
